record.description: Vice-President James R. Angell, Major Henry S. Wygant, C.O., and Adjutant, at the first assembly of the Student Army Training Corps at the University of Chicago, October 1, 1918. Messages from President Wilson and War Department Officials are being read.
record.subject3: United States. Army. Reserve Officers' Training Corps
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Torn, grease pencil marks, photographer stamp. See UC Magazine, Nov. 1918, pp.4
